name: Reach the core
summary: In this free online digging game you play for a Commander of a spaceship stuck in the galaxy outskirts. Luckily, the screening of a nearby planet showed some plasma required for your next space jump. Control your miner with arrow keys of your finger as you play free online on your tablet or mobile phone. Collect resources and buy upgrades to enhance resistance and capacity of the miner battery before starting next day. Dig the ground in this free online arcade game for kids and make your way back home.
